block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This Origami Rosette by Paul Jackson is a really wonderful model. It is the perfect decoration arond the house. This origami rosette is 100% pure origami, no glue and no tape. The design of this model uses a fan lock. When you open it up, it just snaps into this wonderful rosette shape. I hope you enjoy it!!! Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel
